name: PT Rekan Usaha Mikro Anda
description: Developer of a payment and lending networking platform designed to increase access and income for low-income communities through technology. The company's platform is focused on eliminating barriers to financial access for the masses and offers cell phone airtime and bill-pay services and helps create employment opportunities for the poor, enabling users to access products more easily, safely and comfortably.
one_liner: Developer of a payment and lending networking platform designed to increase access and income for low-income communities through technology. The company's platform is focused on eliminating barriers to financial access for the masses and offers cell phone airtime and bill-pay services and helps create employment opportunities for the poor, enabling users to access products more easily, safely and comfortably.
